pageTitle: Giambattista Valli Sleeveless Halter Gown | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Italian sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 60in / 152.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in Italy. Dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk jersey. Soft silk jersey composes an elegant Giambattista Valli gown, which cuts a romantic, grecian-inspired profile. A pleated halter neckline bares the shoulders. The bodice is structured with boning and lightly padded cups. Wrap detailing accentuates the easy drape of the skirt, while a pleated band defines the waist. Hidden back zip. Double-layered. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Italian designer Giambattista Valli creates distinctive, elegant collections that draw from Antonioni films, Rene Gruau paintings, and his own Roman roots. Valli began his career at Roberto Capucci, Fendi, and Ungaro, captivated by the drama of haute couture, and honing his eye for exquisite composition and avant-garde glamour. In 2005, the first Giambattista Valli collection was unveiled, and ever since, the designer's singular, striking aesthetic has been lauded and beloved by the modern fashion elite.
